message.content:
AGENT 3: MIGRATION AGENT - Create Shared Package Structure

**Mission:** Migrate duplicate files to shared package

**Tasks:**

1. Create shared package structure:
```bash
cd /home/claude-flow/packages/shared
mkdir -p master-controller/lib master-controller/types
```

2. Move files from admin-dashboard to shared (use git mv):
```bash
cd /home/claude-flow/packages/admin-dashboard
git mv app/master-controller/lib/cssGenerator.ts ../../shared/master-controller/lib/cssGenerator.ts
git mv app/master-controller/types.ts ../../shared/master-controller/types.ts
```

3. Create index file for exports:
```bash
cat > /home/claude-flow/packages/shared/master-controller/index.ts <<'EOF'
// Master Controller Shared Utilities
// Single source of truth for cssGenerator and types

export * from './lib/cssGenerator';
export * from './types';
EOF
```

4. Update shared package.json exports (if not already present):
```json
"exports": {
  ".": "./index.ts",
  "./master-controller": "./master-controller/index.ts"
}
```

5. Archive duplicates from public-site (don't delete):
```bash
mkdir -p /home/claude-flow/packages/public-site/.archive/master-controller-duplicates-2025-11-04/lib
cd /home/claude-flow/packages/public-site
git mv app/master-controller/lib/cssGenerator.ts .archive/master-controller-duplicates-2025-11-04/lib/
git mv app/master-controller/types.ts .archive/master-controller-duplicates-2025-11-04/
```

**Output:** Confirm structure created, files moved, duplicates archived (not deleted).

{
  "name": "@saa/shared",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Shared components and utilities for SAA projects",
  "private": true,
  "main": "./lib/index.ts",
  "types": "./lib/index.ts",
  "exports": {
    "./components/saa": "./components/saa/index.ts",
    "./components/saa/*": "./components/saa/*.tsx",
    "./components/ui": "./components/ui/index.ts",
    "./components/ui/*": "./components/ui/*.tsx",
    "./lib/*": "./lib/*.ts",
    "./lib/typography": "./lib/typography/index.ts",
    "./lib/supabase": "./lib/supabase/index.ts",
    "./lib/wordpress": "./lib/wordpress/index.ts",
    "./lib/utils": "./lib/utils.ts",
    "./hooks/*": "./hooks/*.ts",
    "./types/*": "./types/*.ts"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "type-check": "tsc --noEmit"
  },
  "peerDependencies": {
    "react": "^19.2.0",
    "react-dom": "^19.2.0",
    "next": "^16.0.0"
  },

    "@radix-ui/react-select": "^2.2.6",

    "@radix-ui/react-switch": "^1.2.6",
    "@radix-ui/react-tabs": "^1.1.13",
    "@supabase/ssr": "^0.7.0",
    "@supabase/supabase-js": "^2.58.0",
    "class-variance-authority": "^0.7.1",
    "clsx": "^2.1.1",
    "date-fns": "^4.1.0",
    "framer-motion": "^12.23.22",
    "lucide-react": "^0.544.0",
    "tailwind-merge": "^2.6.0",

    "typescript": "^5.7.2"
  }
}
